###synopsis


###exploratory data analysis

```{r}
data(mtcars)
```



```{r}

plot(jitter(mpg,4)~wt, data=mtcars, pch=19, col="slateblue2", xlab="weight", ylab="mpg")
```

There are `r nrow(mtcars)` elements in the data set.  
The data present are `r colnames(mtcars)`.  

###linear model

```{r}
carlm <- lm(mpg~wt, mtcars)

abline(carlm, col="red", wt=2)

```
